website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use solution designed for flushing and irrigating the eyes.
pros: Convenient plastic squeeze bottle puts out a thin stream of fluid for easy application
Designed to soothe eye irritation and clean the eyes
cons: Some faulty bottles have been reported

customer_reviews.title: More than an eyewash.  Substitute for expensive eye drops.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Use this eyewash to refill my empty expensive eye drop bottles. Works a thousand times better than eye drops for dry eyes and your eyes aren't affected by the preservatives that the expensive drops use! Excellent product, beyond just an eyewash.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gaab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for itchy eyes
customer_reviews.text: If you have problems with allergies and itchy eyes, I highly recommend using this eye wash daily. It feels amazing and flushed all of the allergens out of your eyes. I use it in the morning before I put in my allergy eyedrops. I also recommend purchasing this particular eyewash at this size, as it is a much better deal than purchasing the smaller bottles at the pharmacy
customer_reviews.author: RoxyDMB

customer_reviews.title: When the desert blows into your eyes this stuff cleans them again.
customer_reviews.text: I live in the desert. Like way out in the middle of no where desert. Like I can look in several directions and see nothing but desert for miles desert. This stuff is what I use when the Mad Max like wind storms come and blow the planet into my eye balls. It instantly cleans them and makes me happy again. Make sure to by the Pro-optics Pro Eye Glass Wash Cup to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended!
customer_reviews.text: This item works great! I got something nasty in my eye (freak accident when opening an oxyclean powder bucket, it shot right into my eye when I lifted the seal from 2 feet below me!) and it washed them out great without needing an eye cup, though it would work even better with an eye cup. I just squeezed the solution into the affected eye and it cleaned it up fairly quickly without additional irritation or dryness.
customer_reviews.author: zyxe

customer_reviews.title: No More Tears
customer_reviews.text: For years I thought I had year round allergies. My eyes would tear all day long, and felt like they had sand in them. Then my Opthamologist told me I have dry eyes and recommended drops. If anything, the recommended drops made it worse. Then, when looking for Collerium, a product I’d used in the past, I stumbled on PsysiciansCare. What a difference this has made! Used twice daily, my eyes have completely stopped watering. Such a simple solution to a problem I’ve had for years, plus it feels great to rinse off your eyeballs, kinda like brushing your teeth for your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Handy for my medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this PhysiciansCare eyewash along with an eye cup and surprisingly find it very easy to use. One eyewash use seemed to last for a couple of hours in relieving the itchiness in this allergy season. I thought it might be difficult to put that much liquid up to and in my eye, but it was easy. I did one eye, rinsed the cup and refilled to do the other -- presume that's the way it's supposed to work. Excellent additional source to help when the single use Refresh drops that I use all the time don't seem to be helping.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My allergies were making my eyes burn and itch. A quick rinse with this solution relieved that almost immediately. Not only that but the sized of the bottle is probably half a year's supply.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: PhysiciansCare 24-201 Eye Wash Solution, 32 oz.
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered a 16 oz. eye wash & loved it. When I saw the 32 oz. bottle for less than $10.00, I ordered it, immediately. This stuff is great & helps get rid of that nasty morning eye grit. Once again, my only complaint is that the provided screw-on eye cup is way too big. I had to buy a smaller eye cup.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Doll

customer_reviews.title: Just like me, easy on the eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with the eye wash cup and it certainly isn't harsh on your eyes. Kind of like very soft water with seemingly no additives. But it is a chemically enhanced water, so there is something in it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Turner

customer_reviews.title: THIS REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how it works because it's only purified water but it works. My dry eye felt extremely irritated I tried this and it was extremely soothing. I'm not saying this is a substitute for my dry eye medication but it did provide relief when my eye bothered me more than usual and so far it's 24 hours and it hasn't come back. I don't use this often but I keep it on hand for the few times I need it, Then it's a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great find. It is my second bottle. I have bad allergies that can easily turn into nasty eye infections. I use this once in the morning and once before bed and it helps keep dust and other allergens from building up. I have actually been able to treat mild infestation with just this. I hate taking all the medicine. I just use at the first sign and several times a day. I AM NOT A DOCTOR AND THAT IS NOT MEDICAL ADVICE! Just what works for me
customer_reviews.author: angela harris

customer_reviews.title: Really not bad compare with Rohto
customer_reviews.text: Constantly suffered from extremely itchy inner eyelids, not sure if it's allergy or allergy aroused infection. Originally trying to order the Rohto and other Japanese brand which seems to be awesome with the reviews I got. And again...cost effect moved me here and when the package actually arrived, I was hesitated if I shall have it returned since the packing was really simple...I meant you are looking at what you got...and then I was thinking maybe I shall give it a try before sending it back. And it really works! And I was comparing the feeling and results with Rohto eye drop which is normally around this price with a volume no more than 10ML!
customer_reviews.author: Holin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My eyes frequently become irritated with my glaucoma drops and allergies due to pollen. Many OTC drops did not work. I found Physicians Eye wash on Amazon and purchase it. The solution cleared out the irritation almost immediately. My eyes feel "normal" with no scratchy irritation. I am so happy to find this product because I no longer suffer with painful eye irritation as I did. Will definitely purchase this product as part of my eye care
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyewash
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this eyewash for years (16oz bottle) and have been very happy with it. I use it daily to clean dust and pollen from my eyes. It doesn't sting or dry my eyes - it floats/washes dust/eyelashes/pollen out of the eye without need for rubbing or other manual manipulation of the eyelid/eye area. My eyes are clear and moistened and "clean" without added chemicals to remove redness, etc. . I love this eye wash - I've used the 16oz bottle and now they've discontinued that size I hope the 32oz version will work just as well - if not, I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: dpb

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Probably a waste of time and money. There is no eye cup or applicator. Instructions say to push the open lid of the bottle against the eye! Right, an open quart bottle of weak acid solution pressed against the eye! Maybe in the shower... but why would you do this if your eyes are already hurting and maybe infected?? I tried pouring a small amount in the cap and pouring that into my eyes but it's messy -- you have to do it in the shower. Maybe a sterile eyedropper would work but I was traveling and didn't have access to one. Try somthing else or make your own solution with distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: D Bruton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. After contractors messed up the house with cement and drywall dust, I needed to clean my eyes well. This eye wash does not burn or irritate. Very soothing. Nice to have an ample supply for tomorrows' pollutions. This saved me some doctor visits. Will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: johnrj

customer_reviews.title: 32 Fl Oz for less than $10
customer_reviews.text: Mostly purified water so not a lot to say. Good amount for the price. Other ingredients; boric acid, sodium borate, sodium chloride.My only negative is it has a ridge or ledfe around the opening of the bottle which makes it a little difficult to pour into eye cups. All in all, a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing for eye irritation
customer_reviews.text: I have been diagnosed with extremely dry eye. In between prescribed medicine I use this a couple of times a day to help relieve the inflammation and itching. Very soothing. I use a glass eye cup that I have had for years.
customer_reviews.author: Carol G

customer_reviews.title: oh man...
customer_reviews.text: I get gummy residue in my eyes, so I'm always looking for something to help. This does... get a good eye wash cup, like this one:  Best investment I've made to combat my eye issues.
customer_reviews.author: RogueSeraph0257

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and kind
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I do not like about economy bottles is that it does not have an 'eye dropper' top....it has a cap. So this solution has to be put into another container....it is so easy with a squeeze top. ANYWAY, I accidentally found out that a small water bottle such as EVIAN which is what I drink fits the eye tightly....amazing, right?....does not leak at all....the only think is it has to be kept sterile, but all the containers have to be....try it, maybe you will think I am correct.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Pearl

customer_reviews.title: because if I don't my eyes will itch like crazy. This is a pretty cheap way to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have seasonal allergies and I use this to wash my eyes out when I am done cutting the grass in the yard, because if I don't my eyes will itch like crazy. This is a pretty cheap way to stop that from happening. I have been using this for about a week and it helps and it does not burn your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: A good replacement for Collyrium
customer_reviews.text: Like many on here I used Collyrium for years; there was just nothing that came close to it. When it was discontinued I tried Bausch & Lomb Advanced Eye Care but sometimes there was a slight stinging sensation. Then I read the reviews here for PhysiciansCare so decided to try it...it's great! Refreshing like Collyrium and quite a bargain at $10 for 32 ounces. I just wish it had a pour spout; has a rather large opening for pouring but is easily worked around. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for eyecare
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. I've had multiple RK surgeries & as a result later had cornea transplants. Need to wash out my eyes frequently. This eyewash along with the cups I purchased separately work well & my eyes feel so good after. I can tell when I forget to use. Eyes get so dry & irritated. Washes out makeup, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Gina 🙂

customer_reviews.title: I tried this eyewash and it worked great flushing all the allergens out of my eyes at ...
customer_reviews.text: After going to an eye doctor several times and paying a fortune for prescriptions that didn't work for me, I tried this eyewash and it worked great flushing all the allergens out of my eyes at a fraction of the cost I paid for the prescriptions!!
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Feel very refreshed after every wash. I didn't know I carried so much dirt in my eyes! Doesn't hurt at all. I use it almost everyday or every time I feel there's something in my eyes. I assume my contact lenses were getting a lot of scratches because I wasn't washing my eyes properly or thoroughly. Had to replace my contacts very often. Hopefully after using this eyewash I won't have to replace my contact lenses as often.
customer_reviews.author: GeEmWae8

customer_reviews.title: I keep mine in the Ice Box!
customer_reviews.text: I keep mine in the Ice Box! Try it! It feels so cool and refreshing when I wash my eyes with it. Unlike eye drops that the expiration date runs out FAST on, this eye wash has a long shelf life, so you do not have to through it out. In allergy season when my eyes itch the most, I mix a squirt of Visine-A in the eye cup with the wash.
customer_reviews.author: S. Joiner

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't sting!
customer_reviews.text: I pierce through the cap with a pin or 1/16 drill bit and squirt it into my eyes to get any junk out, and it works great. It doesn't have that stinging that the tapwater does.
customer_reviews.author: Bread

customer_reviews.title: Very refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Very refreshing eye rinse after being in front of a computer monitor for hours. The price on Amazon is much less than buying this from the drugstore, Target or Walmart. I have some smaller bottles and an eyewash cup that I just refill using this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Padee1010

customer_reviews.title: Happy Max
customer_reviews.text: I have a white Persian cat and his eyes were a general mess. Have used other products but he did not like them. We ordered this and clean his eyes every morning and he does not fuss. Also the price is very good and you get a large bottle
customer_reviews.author: White kitty

customer_reviews.title: great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it had an easier way to pour it into the other container I use for washing my eyes. Other than that it is great for the price, it also arrived much sooner than I thought it would. I still like the Bausch & Lomb Eye wash better, but this will do in a pinch!
customer_reviews.author: SeaCheLe MAR

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I wake up bleary-eyed most mornings. This stuff solves the problem cheaper than any other eye wash I know. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Total Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact it is so refreshing on your eyes and too you can use it for pierced ears before applying earrings. I love the stuff. Just so refreshing and value for the money ! Absolutely, a keeper. I'm do subscribe and save. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Love the size enough to last for a while
customer_reviews.text: I have a dry eye syndrome and need to wash my eye's everyday. And it a pain when all the drug stores only have small expensive bottles. Or none at all. Seems all they carry are contact lens solution's.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Henry O'connor

customer_reviews.title: Huge Eco Bottle
customer_reviews.text: There is very good value here. With all the gardening we do, it seems like we are forever getting bugs or bits of dust or debris in our eyes. It's good to have a good supply of this so that we won't run out for a while.
customer_reviews.author: ABWO

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I buy these giant containers to refill small bottles. I use eye wash several times a day to flush my prosthetic eye. This gets expensive buying small $5 bottles at Walgreen’s. This giant bottle is a God-send and definite money-saver
customer_reviews.author: The Good Whyfe

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs too!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs and I frequently walk where fields are blooming and allergies can wreak havoc on our eyes. I bought this so we could rinse our eyes out after walks. They don't mind it at all, and has cut down on their watery eyes. I use it if I get debris in my eyes and it works well. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Austin

customer_reviews.title: came with no seal
customer_reviews.text: the item says do not use if the seal is broken over the cap. I didn't see a seal over the cap. So I figured might be underneath the cap. Opened the cap to find no seal
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Kim

customer_reviews.title: Makes my eyes feel dry
customer_reviews.text: Though initially the eyewash feels refreshing and leaves my eyes feeling clean and happy, not too long after using this eye wash my eyes feel way more dry than before! Maybe my eyeballs are just weird. I kept the rest of it anyways for when I have something in my eye that I can't get out.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney P

customer_reviews.title: cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Boric acid eyewash solutions can get pretty pricey. This bulk method, used with an eyewash cup, really does the trick for a fraction of the cost. Always makes my eyes feel better.
customer_reviews.author: dwmccall

customer_reviews.title: Gets everything out without the burning or stinging
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband because he complained that the other eye washes burn. Turned out to be a great purchase because he used it yes and was quite happy because there was no stinging or redness after using. Hurray for calm and clean eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great for itching, allergy eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have seasonal allergies and dry eyes. This simple eye wash just stops the itching and watering without any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Bessyrose

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works well to clean and moisturize eyes. I follow with Lumify in the morning and TheraTears nighttime before going to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good value for eye wash
customer_reviews.text: I use this saline solution along with an eye cup to rinse my eyes every day during allergy season. It feels cool and soothing, helping my dry, itchy eyes without medications,
customer_reviews.author: evans045

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye wash.  Feels wonderful on the eyes.
customer_reviews.text: We keep the bottle in the refrigerator to keep it fresh longer and it feels so refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Night Owl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily to clean metal from work out of eyes. Works wonders. Wish they sell bigger bottles
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my dry eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry eyes and I get small particles in my eyes often. I purchased a squirt bottle and works great with the saline. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Annabel

customer_reviews.title: Great relief for eye allergies
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with severe eye allergies, and honestly, this product made a bigger difference to me than anti-allergy eye drops. It helps with remove allergens from my eyes, but also helps to lubricate and soothe my red painful eyes. It provides instant relief: less redness, less pain immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: My eyes feel great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, I also purchased a glass eye wash cup. I use it everyday. To clean the surface of the eye of dirt. Feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! Does not sting your eyes. My eyes do feel a little dry after washing them out with the solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great first aid item!
customer_reviews.text: My honey keeps this in his work truck for quick rinse to eyes! He’s in construction!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Use this product to clean my Persian cat’s eyes daily. Works awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Yaser

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Good Stuff, at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: More than adequate supply, for normal home use. Works well, in removing debris from eyes. Should be in your medicine cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Back-up Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have to rinse my eyes every morning due to allergies. This product is great and the large size makes it affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Priddy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Got this hoping to never use it but we have used it once s it did the job. The eye irritation was gone after a thorough wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: This product  is gentle on the eyes without  any irritation
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my dogs to rinse their eyes and around their eyes . They have allergies that make their eyes run although this product do not specify for pet use.
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Big bottle, great price, excellent eye wash
customer_reviews.text: Simple solution, I refill the Renu bottle that I use which has a nozzle for squirting into my eyes when I refresh my eyes. Works well, no sting, eyes feel clean and a huge bottle for many washes.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Pensor

customer_reviews.title: The cap is broken after a quarter bottle of use
customer_reviews.text: The product itself does help with my allergic itching eyes. However, the cap is broken after one quarter of use that is not acceptable for hygiene products.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Comforting eye wash
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses as he seems to have eye itches and sometimes styes. This eye wash is comforting.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy K. Rodin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is terrific eye wash. It comes in a pretty large bottle, but it does a really good job of cleaning out the eyes.

customer_reviews.title: ... whole eye washing was new to me and I like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: the whole eye washing was new to me and I like this a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Great eye wash, great size and good price
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this product and ease of use. Will definitely be buying this product again.

customer_reviews.title: Really good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the ingredients. No harmful preservatives. It is great.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Good Price

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality!😀
customer_reviews.text: Great eye wash. No burn, very clean. I recommend this product.😀

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: I felt this was a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I felt this was a very good product. It was what I was after.

customer_reviews.text: This eye wash is really good for my little girl's eyes, I have to clean her eyes every time, she's blind.

customer_reviews.text: This bottle is a replacement for one that had to be used a few weeks ago. Some dust particles got into the eyes of a co-worker. he squirted this eye wash into his eyes and didn't have any eye pain. I'm hoping it did its job!

customer_reviews.title: great product

customer_reviews.text: Lots of money for water. It's clean but I already had clean water. I thought it would have diluted boric acid in it.

customer_reviews.title: Would have liked having a dispensing nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked having a dispensing nozzle. I think this must be to fill an eye wash vessel, which I don't have. I just wanted to squirt into my eye but it glugs out because it doesn't have a nozzle. The product is refreshing but the dispensing, for my purposes, is messy.

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey considering it is sterile water
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product for the home/emergency medic bag. It is water. Purified. What else to say.
customer_reviews.author: PURDUE98

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product! I wash my eyes everyday with this product! Helps to keep them clear and free of dry skin flakes which I have a problem with. Highly recommends to others to use!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tonjes

customer_reviews.title: Big Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I use eye wash at least once a day, more during allergy season. Thrilled to find a reasonably priced large bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Togshd

product_meta.title: PhysiciansCare 32 oz. Eyewash Bottle, (24-201)
product_meta.description: Size:32 oz. Refill| Style:Eyewash RefillThe PhysiciansCare 32 oz. Bottle of Eyewash is a sterile ophthalmic solution eyewash, 98.3% purified water. The flushing solution helps to clean the eye and relieve irritation or burning by removing loose foreign material. The bottles come with a tamper evident seal and cap to ensure sterility of the solution.
feature_bullets: 32 oz. bottle of sterile ophthalmic solution eyewash, 98.3% purified water
For cleansing the eye to help relieve irritation or burning by removing loose foreign material
Easy flow nozzle helps fluid flush affected area
Tamper evident bottles to ensure sterility of the solution
Refill for PhysiciansCare 32 oz. Single (24-202) and Double (24-300) Eyewash Stations
